pages.text: Tool Handles can make or break a tool, giving valuable multipliers that can even out imbalanced stats, or jack an already-high stat even higher. Experimentation is key to find the right balance of modifiers for a certain tool.
A simple handle can be crafted from sticks. Most other handles are crafted at the $(l:alloygery:block_smithing_anvil)Smithing Anvil$().
